xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 4 Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika » 4.4 Āsavasāsavaduka, Kusalattika » 4.4.3 Abyākatapada
Hetu
Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika
Āsavasāsavaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Hetu
40.
1664Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
41.
1665Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1666(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
1667Āsavasāsavadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
